episodes.title: Introduction to Propaganda
episodes.description:
In this lecture we investigate the nature of propaganda. We examine what propaganda is, the difference between education and propaganda, the history of propaganda, the nature of political propaganda, and the role propaganda plays in modern democracies.
===================================================
Support us on Patreon: http://patreon.com/academyofideas

Recommended Readings:
Propaganda: The Formation of Men's Attitudes by Jacques Ellul - http://amzn.to/1sAJlpd (affiliate link)
Propaganda by Edward Bernays - http://amzn.to/1VjV7Ql (affiliate link)

Visit http://www.academyofideas.com for more videos, video transcripts and more!
===================================================
